configuration.is.found.spanish:
{}Usar configuración actual
{}Configurar de nuevo
Configuración actual:
{}{}

configuration.is.not.found.spanish:
No se pudo encontrar una configuracion en {}
Vamos a configurar la aplicación.
configuration.is.not.found.english:
Can not locate configuration file at {}
Lets configure the application.

configuration.token.spanish: Inserta el token de tu aplicación BOT de discord.
configuration.token.english: Insert your discord's application BOT token.

configuration.server.spanish: Inserta el ID de tu servidor de discord.

configuration.hlds.spanish: Inserta la ruta absoluta a hlds.exe por ejemplo: C:/Program Data/../Half-Life/hlds.exe
configuration.hlds.english: Insert the absolute path to hlds.exe for example: C:/Program Data/../Half-Life/hlds.exe

configuration.mod.spanish: Inserta el nombre de la carpeta de su mod, si es un servidor de half life inserte "valve"
configuration.mod.english: Insert the folder name of your mod, if this is a half life server insert "valve"

configuration.roles.spanish: Inserta una lista de ID de roles de discord que podrán utilizar el comando. Separa con espacios. Usa 0 para no limitar a ningun usuario. Usa -1 para solo administradores.
configuration.roles.english: Insert a list of discord roles's ID that would be able to use the command. Separate with spaces. Use 0 to not limit to any user. Use -1 for administrators only.

configuration.arguments.spanish: Inserta una lista de argumentos para ejecutar en el hlds.exe
configuration.arguments.english: Insert a list of arguments to execute on the hlds.exe

configuration.shutdown.spanish:
Inserta una cantidad de tiempo en segundos en que el servidor será apagado cuando no haya jugadores por ese tiempo.
0 - nunca apagar.
configuration.shutdown.english:
Insert an amount of time in seconds in wich the server will be shut down when there are not players connected during that time.
0 - never shut down.

command.no.administrator.spanish: Este comando ha sido configurado como solo para administradores.
command.no.administrator.english: This command is been configured as for administrators only.

command.no.roles.spanish: Este comando ha sido configurado como solo para roles especificos.
command.no.roles.english: This command is been configured as for specific roles only.

shutdown.server.spanish: El servidor ha permanecido sin jugadores durante {} segundos, Apagando.
shutdown.server.english: The server didn't had any player since {} seconds, Shutting down.
